content.query:
use nyc_taxi_database;

SELECT * FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-01.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
as trip_data

-- selecting data from folder

SELECT * FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
as trip_data

-- selecting data from subfolders

SELECT * FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
as trip_data

-- selecting data from more than one file

SELECT * FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*',
    'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=03/*'),
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
as trip_data

-- using more than one wildcard

SELECT * FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
as trip_data

-----------------------------
-- getting file name as well
-----------------------------

SELECT 
    trip_data.filename() as file_name,
    trip_data.*
 FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
as trip_data

-- finding the count

SELECT 
    trip_data.filename() as file_name,
    count(trip_data.filename())
 FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
as trip_data
GROUP BY trip_data.filename()
order by trip_data.filename()

-- filtering

SELECT 
    trip_data.filename() as file_name,
    count(trip_data.filename())
 FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
as trip_data
WHERE trip_data.filename() in ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv','green_tripdata_2020-09.csv')
GROUP BY trip_data.filename()
order by trip_data.filename()

-- using filepath

SELECT 
    trip_data.filename() as file_name,
    trip_data.filepath() as file_path,
    count(trip_data.filename())
 FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
as trip_data
WHERE trip_data.filename() in ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv','green_tripdata_2020-09.csv')
GROUP BY trip_data.filename(), trip_data.filepath()
order by trip_data.filename(), trip_data.filepath()

--------------------------

SELECT 
    trip_data.filename() as file_name,
    trip_data.filepath(1) as year,
    trip_data.filepath(2) as month,
    count(trip_data.filename())
 FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
as trip_data
WHERE trip_data.filepath(1)='2020'
and trip_data.filepath(2) in ('02','03','05')
GROUP BY trip_data.filename(), trip_data.filepath(1), trip_data.filepath(2)
order by trip_data.filename()
